title: Image recognition tutorial
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to make your smartphone recognize images.

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open it locally.

With the simple mode option we can recognize one element, with the advanced mode option we can recognize several elements

![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/voice-messages-dependent-on-image-recognition/smart-camera.png)

Gives a name to the image to be recognized

![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/voice-messages-dependent-on-image-recognition/image.png)

Click on record this example to use the current image for training, you can use more images

![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/voice-messages-dependent-on-image-recognition/example.png)

click on learn another image to recognize something else

After finishing the training click on end training

![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/voice-messages-dependent-on-image-recognition/training.png)

Moves the following components to the workspace

the **detection** component

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/smartcamera/detection.png)

and the **event** component into the workspace

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/smartcamera/event.png)

we will use the events to be aware of what the camera is detecting, imagine that there is a person watching what the camera captures and when a change occurs, he notifies us to execute the code.

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Log/Log.png) on the sidebar,

move the **print** component to the workspace

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Log/print.png)

and put the detection component into the print component as in the image

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/smartcamera/log.png)

Place the components as it shown in the picture

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/smartcamera/blocks.png)
